channel.title: ₧ why when I run my client ₧
channel.description:
I did almost everything, the tutorial the person had posted on my topic board, this is what my client thing is saying when I run my client...
The system cannot find the path specified.
why is the run server thing saying this what did I do wrong... If you can help me fix this error please write back on my topic board...
Thanks, Colgi

item.title: ₧ why when I run my client ₧
item.dc:creator: @Ic3_Barrage Ic3 Barrage
item.description:
@Ic3_Barrage wrote:

Dont use Useless polls.

Read full topic

item.title: ₧ why when I run my client ₧
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

go to computer>program files>Java> Jdk*_**

*'s are your jdk version
